trends: There has been one other sighting in Scituate
There were no other sightings in Scituate on or around September 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThese are photos of something I saw above us yesterday on Humarock beach Scituate MA. It was high and reflected the sun as it moved. photo (3351) is of it moving SE to E. photo (3352) was of it hovering torards the E and 3352_1 is cropped from 3352 Air trafic from BOS Logan Int Airport was higher as see on photo 3353 but local municipal airport ( 4 miles to the south) was lower
Summary: observed a shinny object direcly overehead
